TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceCredentials extends System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityCredentialsManager implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public Class ServiceCredentials Inherits SecurityCredentialsManager Implements IServiceBehavior
type ServiceCredentials = class inherit SecurityCredentialsManager interface IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 設定服務認證。

span.span: Configures a service credential.

summary.span: 您可以使用此類別來指定服務認證，例如 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Use this class to specify the credential for the service such as an X.509 certificate.

summary.span: 此外，也可以使用此類別對各種用戶端認證指定驗證模型，例如使用者名稱和密碼驗證。

span.span: Also, use this class to specify the authentication model for various client credentials such as user name and password validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的方法會使用此類別做為 方法中的參數，而且此類別是由 屬性傳回。This class is used as a parameter in the method, by methods of the , and is returned by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何覆寫這個類別，以實作自訂的服務認證。The following code shows how to override this class to implement custom service credentials. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫此屬性傳回的 物件成員，指定要使用的憑證。You can specify the certificate to use by calling members of the object returned by this property. 您也可以設定此值使用[<憑證>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set this value using the [<certificate>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/certificate-for-identity.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 這個程式碼會顯示如何指定服務使用的憑證。This code shows how to specify the certificate that a service uses. 先建立 類別，然後建立會執行下列動作的單一複雜程式碼陳述式：A class is created, followed by a single complex code statement that does the following: - 屬性可用於存取 的執行個體。 property is used to access an instance of . - 執行個體接著叫用 。The instance then invokes . - 屬性會傳回 物件，接著會在此物件上呼叫 方法。The property returns a object, on which the method is then called. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此類別並藉由設定 屬性，指定是否允許匿名 Windows 使用者存取。Use this class to specify whether to allow anonymous Windows users access by setting the property. 同時，使用此類別並藉由設定 屬性，指定是否要將使用者所屬的群組資訊包含在 中。Also, use this class to specify whether to include a group information to which users belong in the by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何使用這個屬性取得服務使用之認證的執行個體。The following code shows how to use this property to get the instance of the credential used by the service. [!code-csharp[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEWindowsServiceCredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uewindowsservicecredential/vb/source.vb#1)]
